text:
sat on this idea for a while now, couldn't get myself started. felt way too personal and held a lot of meaning.

but today, i commit to it.

let me know if the idea slide isn't clear enough what i'm building. 6 weeks is a start!

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV https://t.co/6q3ufmx6sk

quoted.text:
i always revisit my why. 

and the reason that got me started in software engineering is actually game design. 

i have gone “wayward” and have spent my entire adult career life in web development. 

this is not a statement of anything, just a matter of fact. 

i always revisit.
